arts.ttl: Four things we learnt as Nottingham Forest breeze past Brentford
arts.sum: And then, the last action of the first period saw the Tricky Trees all but confirm the win, as Elliot Anderson played a fantastic ball into the path of Wood, who coolly rounded Caoimhin Kelleher to finish into an empty net. And similarly to Chris Wood, Nuno Espírito Santo will need Anderson to step up if Forest are to continue on their ambitious path.

arts.ttl: Keith Andrews says Brentford were too naive during dismal Nottingham Forest defeat
arts.sum: A nightmare debut in the dugout for the new boss

arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest 3-1 Brentford: sparkling opening performance for the Reds
arts.sum: Brentford, without Bryan Mbeumo, who has moved to Manchester United and has been an influential player in the previous seasons, struggled to create a rhythm, conceding three goals in the first half. They turned over a Brentford lost possession, and in a flash, Anderson played a first-time pass straight through the heart of the defense.

arts.ttl: Chris Wood catches Mohamed Salah with opening weekend brace against Brentford
arts.sum: Chris Wood picked up where he left off with a brace in Nottingham Forest's 3-1 win over Brentford in their Premier League opener at the City Ground on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest ease Nuno Espirito Santo’s fears by sweeping aside Brentford
arts.sum: Forest were 3-0 up at half-time against the sorry Bees.

arts.ttl: Wood stars as Nottingham Forest thrash sorry Brentford
arts.sum: Chris Wood scored twice as Nottingham Forest beat sorry Brentford 3-1 on a gruelling managerial bow for Keith Andrews.

arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest vs Brentford LIVE: Gibbs-White starts, Wissa absent for visitors
arts.sum: Follow live coverage as Nottingham Forest face Brentford today in the Premier League. Another top-flight season will be covered in full right here with The Independent, as reigning champions Liverpool look to fend off competition from Arsenal, Manchester City and more.

arts.ttl: Team News: Nottingham Forest vs. Brentford injury, suspension list, predicted XIs
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up all the latest team news ahead of Nottingham Forest's Premier League opener against Brentford on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Will Wood lead Forest attack? Predicted Nottingham Forest lineup vs. Brentford
arts.sum: Sports Mole takes an in-depth look at how Nottingham Forest could line up for Sunday's Premier League clash with Brentford.

arts.ttl: Andrews facing Kelleher call: Predicted Brentford lineup vs. Nottingham Forest
arts.sum: Sports Mole takes an in-depth look at how Brentford could line up for Sunday's Premier League clash with Nottingham Forest.
